verses.verse: The hand <WH3027> of Yahweh <WH3068> was on me, <WH3318> and he brought me out in the Spirit <WH7307> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and set me down <WH5117> in the midst <WH8432> of the valley; <WH1237> and it was full <WH4392> of bones. <WH6106>
He caused me to pass <WH5674> by them all around: <WH5439> and behold, <WH3966> there were very many <WH7227> in the open <WH6440> valley; <WH1237> and behold, <WH3966> they were very dry. <WH3002>
He said <WH559> to me, <WH1121> Son of man, <WH120> can these bones <WH6106> live? <WH2421> I answered, <WH559> Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH3069> you know. <WH3045>
Again he said <WH559> to me, <WH5012> Prophesy over these bones, <WH6106> and tell <WH559> them, <WH3002> you dry bones, <WH6106> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh. <WH3068>
Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3069> to these bones: <WH6106> Behold, <WH7307> I will cause breath to enter <WH935> into you, <WH2421> and you shall live.

I will lay <WH5414> sinews <WH1517> on you, <WH5927> and will bring up flesh <WH1320> on you, <WH7159> and cover you with skin, <WH5785> and put <WH5414> breath <WH7307> in you, <WH2421> and you shall live; and you shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>

So I prophesied <WH5012> as I was commanded: <WH6680> and as I prophesied, <WH5012> there was a noise, <WH6963> and behold, <WH7494> an earthquake; and the bones <WH6106> came together, <WH7126> bone <WH6106> to its bone. <WH6106>
I saw, <WH7200> and, <WH1517> behold, there were sinews on them, <WH1320> and flesh came up, <WH5927> and skin <WH5785> covered <WH7159> them above; <WH4605> but there was no breath in them. <WH7307>

Then he said <WH559> to me, <WH5012> Prophesy to the wind, <WH7307> prophesy, <WH5012> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> and tell <WH559> the wind, <WH7307> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Come <WH935> from the four <WH702> winds, <WH7307> breath, <WH7307> and breathe <WH5301> on these slain, <WH2026> that they may live. <WH2421>

So I prophesied <WH5012> as he commanded <WH6680> me, <WH7307> and the breath came <WH935> into them, <WH2421> and they lived, and stood up <WH5975> on their feet, <WH7272> an exceedingly <WH3966> great <WH1419> army. <WH2428>

Then he said <WH559> to me, <WH1121> Son of man, <WH120> these bones <WH6106> are the whole house <WH1004> of Israel: <WH3478> behold, <WH559> they say, Our bones <WH6106> are dried <WH3001> up, <WH8615> and our hope is lost; <WH6> we are clean cut off. <WH1504>

Therefore prophesy, <WH5012> and tell <WH559> them, <WH559> Thus says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Behold, <WH5971> I will open <WH6605> your graves, <WH6913> and cause you to come up <WH5927> out of your graves, <WH6913> my people; <WH935> and I will bring you into the land <WH127> of Israel. <WH3478>
You shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh, <WH3068> when I have opened <WH6605> your graves, <WH6913> and caused you to come up <WH5927> out of your graves, <WH6913> my people. <WH5971>

I will put <WH5414> my Spirit <WH7307> in you, <WH2421> and you shall live, and I will place <WH3240> you in your own land: <WH127> and you shall know <WH3045> that I, <WH3068> Yahweh, have spoken <WH1696> it and performed <WH6213> it, <WH5002> says Yahweh. <WH3068>
The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came again to me, <WH559> saying,

You, <WH1121> son of man, <WH120> take <WH3947> one <WH259> stick, <WH6086> and write <WH3789> on it, <WH3063> For Judah, and for the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> his companions: <WH2270> then take <WH3947> another <WH259> stick, <WH6086> and write <WH3789> on it, <WH3130> For Joseph, the stick <WH6086> of Ephraim, <WH669> and for all the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> his companions: <WH2270>
and join <WH7126> them for you one <WH259> to another <WH259> into one <WH259> stick, <WH6086> that they may become one <WH259> in your hand. <WH3027>
When the children <WH1121> of your people <WH5971> shall speak <WH559> to you, <WH559> saying, Will you not show us what you mean by these? <WH5046>

tell <WH1696> them, <WH1696> Thus says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Behold, <WH3947> I will take the stick <WH6086> of Joseph, <WH3130> which is in the hand <WH3027> of Ephraim, <WH669> and the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> his companions; <WH2270> and I will put <WH5414> them with it, <WH6086> even with the stick of Judah, <WH3063> and make <WH6213> them one <WH259> stick, <WH6086> and they shall be one <WH259> in my hand. <WH3027>
The sticks <WH6086> whereon you write <WH3789> shall be in your hand <WH3027> before their eyes. <WH5869>

Say <WH1696> to them, <WH559> Thus says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Behold, <WH3947> I will take the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from among <WH996> the nations, <WH1471> where they are gone, <WH1980> and will gather <WH6908> them on every side, <WH5439> and bring <WH935> them into their own land: <WH127>

and I will make <WH6213> them one <WH259> nation <WH1471> in the land, <WH776> on the mountains <WH2022> of Israel; <WH3478> and one <WH259> king <WH4428> shall be king <WH4428> to them all; <WH5750> and they shall be no more two <WH8147> nations, <WH1471> neither shall they be divided <WH2673> into two <WH8147> kingdoms any more at all; <WH4467>

neither shall they defile <WH2930> themselves any more with their idols, <WH1544> nor with their detestable things, <WH8251> nor with any of their transgressions; <WH6588> but I will save <WH3467> them out of all their dwelling <WH4186> places, <WH2398> in which they have sinned, and will cleanse <WH2891> them: <WH5971> so shall they be my people, and I will be their God. <WH430>

My servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> shall be king <WH4428> over them; <WH259> and they all shall have one shepherd: <WH7462> they shall also walk <WH3212> in my ordinances, <WH4941> and observe <WH8104> my statutes, <WH2708> and do them. <WH6213>

They shall dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> that I have given <WH5414> to Jacob <WH3290> my servant, <WH5650> in which your fathers <WH1> lived; <WH3427> and they shall dwell <WH3427> therein, <WH1121> they, and their children, and their children <WH1121>'s children, <WH1121> forever: <WH5769> and David <WH1732> my servant <WH5650> shall be their prince <WH5387> for <WH5704> ever. <WH5769>

Moreover I will make <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> of peace <WH7965> with them; <WH5769> it shall be an everlasting covenant <WH1285> with them; <WH5414> and I will place them, <WH7235> and multiply them, <WH5414> and will set my sanctuary <WH4720> in their midst <WH8432> forevermore. <WH5769>
My tent <WH4908> also shall be with them; <WH430> and I will be their God, and they shall be my people. <WH5971>
The nations <WH1471> shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh <WH3068> who sanctifies <WH6942> Israel, <WH3478> when my sanctuary <WH4720> shall be in their midst <WH8432> forevermore. <WH5769>
